EmailTemplate.subject: Would you like to hear more from us?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in our Inertial Navigation System case study!

We saw that you recently downloaded the Improving Our World's Mapping Systems with Highly Accurate Inertial Navigation Systems case study and thought you might like to receive newsletters or product information and special offers from our HGuide team.
